item.description:
The Esplanade

EVENT: Join us for the music of Aaron Copland including "Appalachian Spring," "At the River," and "Simple Gifts," as we enjoy the Landmark Orchestra’s concert series along the banks of the Charles River on the Esplanade.

There is no charge for the concert.  The group will be sitting in front of the hatch shell, in line with the center of the stage.  People should arrive around 6:45 p.m. so that we can settle in and introduce ourselves before the music begins at 7 p.m. The concerts run every Wednesday night through Aug. 29. Bring dinner and something to sit on.

Trip's Coordinator(TC):  Mosaicwalks@yahoo.com

RSVP: No RSVP is required. Contact the TC one week prior to the concert with any questions. Drizzle cancels.
MEET: between 6:45 p.m. to 7 p.m. on the steps in front of the stage. Leader will be wearing a Mosaic T-shirt. After 7 p.m. the group will be seated on the grass directly in front of the stage.

COST: $5 for a Mosaic guest, which can be credited toward a Mosaic membership costing $25.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact the Trip's Coordinator at email address posted

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Classical Music at the Esplanade Series
